resources.string: User does not have any repos.
You do not have an Internet connection. Connect, then try again.
Sorry! There was an issue. The team has been notified. Please try again later.
Sorry! Our system is currently not working. Come back in a few minutes and try again.
There is an issue with your Internet connection. Try again soon.
Sorry! There was an issue. The team has been notified. Please try again later.
Sorry, you have been logged out. Please login again and try again.
Allow app to collect my basic activity to help improve the app.
Sorry! There was an error. The team has been notified to fix it. Try again in a day or two.
Finishing logging you in.\nIt shouldn\'t take too long…
Enter your email address below to begin.
Check your email to finish the login process.
Sorry! You must log out, login to your account, and try again.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Are you sure you want to log out of your %s account? If yes, the data for the %s account will be deleted from the device and you will be prompted to login to another account.
You have changes in the app that have not synced yet. You will lose your changes if you log out now.
All of your data has been synced. You are now safe to log out.
You have changes in the app that have not been synced yet. We tried to sync them automatically for you, but you are not connected to the Internet. Connect, then try again.
We tried to sync all of your changes, but there were some errors that need resolved. Check for errors in the app and try again.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Want to login to a different account?
We see you were previously logged into your account: %s.\n\nUnlock your account to get back to what you were doing or log into a new account.
Sorry! You need to take a little break. Wait a minute, then try again.
